customer_name: Wildlife Refuge & Sanctuary Silver Wolf Inc.
site_name: Wildlife Refuge & Sanctuary Silver Wolf Inc.

citations.narrative:
The rusted metal entrance door and support beam in the enclosure for the 2 yellow-headed amazon parrots have not yet
been repaired. There is a metal stand feeder with a broken edge in this enclosure and the metal entrance door to the Blue
and Yellow Macaw enclosure has holes and jagged edges. These are areas where a bird could be injured by the sharp
edges. Primary enclosures must be maintained with no sharp points or edges that could injure the birds.
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the manager.
n

Primary enclosures. 
The rusted metal entrance door and support beam in the enclosure for the 2 yellow-headed amazon parrots have not yet 
been repaired. There is a metal stand feeder with a broken edge in this enclosure and the metal entrance door to the Blue 
and Yellow Macaw enclosure has holes and jagged edges. These are areas where a bird could be injured by the sharp 
edges. Primary enclosures must be maintained with no sharp points or edges that could injure the birds. 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the manager.
